########### CMakeMaker autogenerated file ###########
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.6)

find_package(GMock)
find_package(GTest)

set(cpp_files
  test_main.cc
  precomp.h
  precomp.cc
)

add_msvc_precompiled_header("precomp.h" "precomp.cc" cpp_files)
add_executable(testdriver ${cpp_files})

include_directories(testdriver
  ${GMOCK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${GTEST_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ../../header_libraries/slib_header_libraries/include
  ../../header_libraries/slib_header_libraries/include/entity_component_system
  ../../header_libraries/slib_header_libraries/include/file_system
  ../../header_libraries/slib_header_libraries/include/synchronization
  ../cmd_plant_uml_generator/source
  ../cmd_plant_uml_generator/source/components
  ../cmd_plant_uml_generator/source/systems
  ../cmd_plant_uml_generator/test
)

target_link_libraries(testdriver
  ${GMOCK_LIBRARIES}
  ${GTEST_LIBRARIES}
  libpthread.so
  tbb
)

add_dependencies(testdriver plant_uml_generator testdriver ALL_PRE_BUILD)
